caption.center: VISTEON SYSTEMS AND GAB ROBINS, Petitioners v. WORKERS' COMPENSATION

court.center: Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Middle District.

opinion.posture: Petition for Allowance of Appeal from the Order of the Commonwealth Court.
opinion.opinion_text:
AND NOW, this 24th day of August, 2011, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby DENIED.
The Petitioner's Application for Supersedeas is herebyDENIED.Page 1
